name: Treasure Skies
description:
Treasure Skies takes the player to floating worlds in search of treasure. Spend your time picking up treasure as you run either idly down the center of the map or mix it up by grabbing even more coins and sometimes chest by going off the beaten path. Then use those coins to upgrade your armor and start gaining coins per second. 

As a player, I enjoy infinite-runners and idle clicker games.

As a player, I wish not all of them were 2D.

So as a Developer, I decided to combine an infinite- runner and idle clicker together but in 3D.
